properties.entry: select * from( select ROWNUM r , n.* from( select NOTICE_NO , User_ID , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(n.REGIST_DATE, 'YY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') REGIST_DATE , origin_name , change_name , file_path from MZYM_NOTICE n join mzym_member on (user_no = notice_writer) left join attachment a on (a.status = 'Y' and ATT_CATEGORY ='N' and a.att_no = n.notice_no) where n.status = 'Y' order by NOTICE_NO DESC )n ) where r BETWEEN ? and ?
select count(*) from mzym_notice where STATUS = 'Y'

insert into mzym_notice( NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_WRITER , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , REGIST_DATE , EDIT_DATE , START_DATE , STATUS ) values( SEQ_NOTICENO.nextval , ? , ? , ? , sysdate , sysdate , sysdate , default )

insert into attachment ( FILE_NO , ATT_NO , ATT_CATEGORY , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , UPLORD_DATE , FILE_LEVEL , STATUS ) values ( SEQ_ATTACHMENT.nextval , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , sysdate , ? , DEFAULT )
update mzym_Notice set notice_Title = ? , notice_content = ? , Edit_date = sysdate , notice_writer = ? where notice_no = ?
update attachment set origin_name = ? , change_name= ? , UPLORD_DATE = sysdate where att_no = ?
update mzym_Notice set STATUS = 'N' where NOTICE_NO = ?
update Attachment set STATUS = 'N' where att_no = ? and ATT_CATEGORY = ?
select count(*) from mzym_advice where status = ?
update mzym_advice set advice_tr = ( select user_no from mzym_member where user_id = ? ) , ADVICE_REPEAT = ? , STATUS = 'Y' where ADVICE_NO = ?
select count(*) from mzym_advice where status = ?

select * from( select ROWNUM r , n.* from( select ADVICE_NO , ADVICE_USER , PHONE_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , ADVICE_DATE , NVL(user_id, ADVICE_USER) user_id , ADVICE_CONTENT , ADVICE_REPEAT , TO_CHAR(REGIST_DATE, 'YY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') REGIST_DATE , TO_CHAR(a.MODIFY_DATE, 'YY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') MODIFY_DATE , a.status from mzym_advice a join service_category USING (CATEGORY_NO) left join mzym_member on (user_no = advice_tr) where a.status = ? order by ADVICE_NO DESC )n ) where r BETWEEN ? and ?
update mzym_advice set advice_tr = ( select user_no from mzym_member where user_id = ? ) , ADVICE_REPEAT = ? , STATUS = 'Y' where ADVICE_NO = ?
update mzym_advice set MODIFY_DATE = sysdate , ADVICE_REPEAT = ? where ADVICE_NO = ?
update mzym_advice set status = 'X' where advice_no = ?
select count(*) from report where status = ? and BOARD_NO is not null
select count(*) from report where status = ? and COMMENT_NO is not null

select * from( select ROWNUM r , report.* from( select
REPORT_NO , mzym_member.USER_ID reportID , REPORT_DATE , CATEGORY_NO , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORTER
, BOARD_NO , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_TITLE , board_Content , board.USER_ID boardID
, ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL from report join ( select BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , USER_ID , board_content , BOARD_TYPE , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL from mzym_board join mzym_member on(BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) left join Attachment on (att_no = BOARD_NO and ATT_CATEGORY != 'N') ) board using (BOARD_NO) join mzym_member on (REPORT_USER = USER_NO) where report.status = ? and board_type = ? order by REPORT_NO DESC )report ) where r BETWEEN ? and ?

select * from( select ROWNUM r , n.* from( select
REPORT_NO , USER_ID , REPORT_DATE , CATEGORY_NO , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORTER
, com.board_No , BOARD_TITLE , board_type
, com.USER_NAME , comment_no , comment_content from report join ( select COMMENT_NO , BOARD_NO , board_type , BOARD_TITLE , USER_NAME , COMMENT_CONTENT from board_comment join mzym_board using (BOARD_NO)
) com using (COMMENT_NO)
join mzym_member on (REPORT_USER = USER_NO) where report.STATUS = ? and BOARD_TYPE = ? order by REPORT_NO DESC )n ) where r BETWEEN ? and ?
select CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_NAME from report_category
select CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_NAME from Board_category
update mzym_board set BOARD_TYPE = ? , status = 'Y' where board_no = ( select board_no from report where report_no = ? )
update report set status = 'N' , REPORT_CONTENT = ? , REPORTER = ? where report_no = ?
update report set status = 'K' where report_no = ?
update mzym_board set status = 'Y' where board_no = ( select board_no from report where report_no = ? )
update mzym_board set status = 'N' where board_no = ( select board_no from report where report_no = ? )
update board_comment set status = 'Y' where COMMENT_NO = ( select COMMENT_NO from report where report_no = ? )
update board_comment set status = 'N' where COMMENT_NO = ( select COMMENT_NO from report where report_no = ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MZYM_BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , USER_ID , COUNT , REGIST_DATE FROM MZYM_BOARD B JOIN MZYM_MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO MZYM_BOARD ( BOARD_NO , BOARD_WRITER , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARDNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , ATT_NO , ATT_CATEGORY , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTACHMENT.NEXTVAL , SEQ_BOARDNO.CURRVAL , 'B' , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE MZYM_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , USER_ID , BOARD_TYPE FROM MZYM_BOARD JOIN MZYM_MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND MZYM_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE ATT_NO = ? ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL ASC
UPDATE MZYM_BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ? , BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? , CHANGE_NAME = ? , FILE_PATH = ? WHERE FILE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , ATT_NO , ATT_CATEGORY , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTACHMENT.NEXTVAL , ? , 'B' , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT COMMENT_NO , MZYM_MEMBER.USER_NAME , COMMENT_CONTENT , COMMENT_WRITER , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(COMMENT_DATE),'YY/MM/DD HH:MI') COMMENT_DATE FROM BOARD_COMMENT jOIN MZYM_MEMBER ON (COMMENT_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_COMMENT.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COMMENT_NO DESC
INSERT INTO BOARD_COMMENT ( COMMENT_NO , COMMENT_WRITER , BOARD_NO , COMMENT_CONTENT , COMMENT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMENTNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , BOARD_NO , CATEGORY_NO , REPORT_USER , REPORT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPORTNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO , COMMENT_NO , REPORT_USER , CATEGORY_NO , REPORT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPORTNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
UPDATE MZYM_BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_NAME FROM BOARD_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO = ?
INSERT INTO MZYM_BOARD ( BOARD_NO , BOARD_WRITER , BOARD_TYPE , BOARD_TITLE , REVIEW_RATE , BOARD_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARDNO.NEXTVAL , ? , 3 , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , ATT_NO , ATT_CATEGORY , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTACHMENT.NEXTVAL , SEQ_BOARDNO.CURRVAL , 'B' , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , REVIEW_RATE , COUNT , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME TITLEIMG_URL FROM MZYM_BOARD B JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (ATT_NO = BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 3 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MZYM_BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 3 AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO , USER_NAME , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(N.REGIST_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') REGIST_DATE FROM MZYM_NOTICE N JOIN MZYM_MEMBER ON (NOTICE_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_WRITER FROM MZYM_NOTICE JOIN MZYM_MEMBER ON (NOTICE_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND MZYM_NOTICE.STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MZYM_ADVICE ( ADVICE_NO , CATEGORY_NO , ADVICE_USER , PHONE_NO , ADVICE_DATE , ADVICE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_ADVICENO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MZYM_VIDEO WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND VIDEO_LEVEL = 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT VIDEO_NO , VIDEO_TITLE , LINK , VIDEO_LEVEL FROM MZYM_VIDEO WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND VIDEO_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY VIDEO_NO DESC ) A )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT VIDEO_NO , VIDEO_TITLE , LINK , VIDEO_LEVEL FROM MZYM_VIDEO WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND VIDEO_LEVEL = 2 ORDER BY VIDEO_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , USER_NAME , COUNT , REGIST_DATE FROM MZYM_BOARD B JOIN MZYM_MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND ROWNUM < 10 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , USER_NAME , COUNT , REGIST_DATE FROM MZYM_BOARD B JOIN MZYM_MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_TYPE = 2 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND ROWNUM < 10 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
